ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON to XML - Transform and convert data
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template converts a JSON file from a local fileshare into XML, optionally transforms it using an XSLT stylesheet, and saves it locally as an XML file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_filename.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the JSON file, including the file name."},"XsltScript":{"Value":"\"<xsl:stylesheet>...</xsl:stylesheet>\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The XSLT stylesheet for transforming the resulting XML data. Optional, can be empty if no transformation is needed."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_filename.xml\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the created XML file, including the file name."}}

Process.Name: JSON to XML - Transform and convert data
Process.Description: This template converts a JSON file from a local fileshare into XML, optionally transforms it using an XSLT stylesheet, and saves it locally as an XML file.
